attributes.action: remove from office any Minister who is brings the Government into disrepute
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Now we hear Jacqui Smith has apparently charged to expenses her husband's adult movies, surely this is a step too far? However sorry she is, as Home Secretary she should either resign or be removed from office forthwith. The Government is skating on very thin ice; how many more nails in its coffin can it accept?

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
